title: Stacey Solomon attends the launch of her Primark clothing line
text:
She has just revealed her second collaboration with Primark.

And Stacey Solomon was in high spirits as she attended the VIP launch of her fashion forward and affordable clothing line on Thursday afternoon in London.

The TV presenter, 30, offered a glimpse into her latest collection as she donned two different pieces from the range to the glitzy launch party.

Glowing: Stacey Solomon was in high spirits as she attended the VIP launch of her fashion forward and affordable clothing line on Thursday afternoon in London

Stacey first rocked a vibrant orange turtleneck tucked into a pair of high-waisted blue mom jeans teamed with some trendy white ankle boots.

The mother-of-three accessorised her look with a simple gold pendant necklace and a pair of delicate hoop earrings in the same shade.

She added further touches of glam by styling her brunette tresses in loose bouncy curls, while highlighting her striking features with neutrally toned make-up.

Wow! The TV presenter, 30, offered a glimpse into her latest collection as she donned pieces from the range to the glitzy launch party

New look: She later switched up her orange polo neck for a black version, and layered it with a chic plaid tweed mini dress in shades of black and white

Bold: Stacey rocked a vibrant orange turtleneck tucked into a pair of high-waisted blue mom jeans teamed with some trendy white ankle boots

Details: The mother-of-three accessorised her look with a simple gold pendant necklace and a pair of delicate hoop earrings in the same shade

She later switched up her orange polo neck for a black version, and layered it with a chic plaid tweed mini dress in shades of black and white.

Following the roaring success of the original Stacey Solomon X Primark edit, Stacey - a life-long lover of the affordable high street hotspot - has curated a chic new collection, with prices ranging from just £4 to £35.

Speaking about the project, Stacey said: ‘I’m so overwhelmed and excited to have been asked to design another collection for Primark. I’m so thrilled that my last collection went down so well, and I can’t quite believe I’m doing it all again.'

On the personal front, Stacey has just celebrated her 30th birthday with a surprise trip to Brussels as well an intimate family dinner.

Elated: Stacey appeared to be having the team of her life as she posed for snaps

Sweet: Stacey opted to flash some flesh in the mini skirt forgoing any tights for the look

The Loose Women presenter was treated to a surprise birthday dinner party ahead of the actual day on Thursday evening, as she kick-started the celebrations with a lavish meal and cake with her nearest and dearest.

Stacey admitted to feeling emotional and said that 'everything is making me cry' as she documented the pink-themed night in a room filled with balloons, streamers and candles on her Instagram Stories.

Stacey was filmed blowing out the candles on a unicorn cake as her family sang happy birthday in the background, however Stacey joked that 'none of them could sing a note' alongside the clip.

Carefree! Stacey posed in a forest covered in pretty purple flowers

Wave your arms in the air! Stacey got the party started early in the evening

Pump it up! Stacey was pictured dancing with her pal Shanie Ryan

During the evening Stacey was gifted with lots of lovely presents, including a wine glass with '30 the big one' printed across the front as well as a room diffuser, which was decorated with huge roses.

The following day on Friday Morning, celebrations started early for Stacey as she was ambushed by her two sons, Zackary, 11 and Leighton, seven, as she sat on the toilet feeding her baby son Rex, four months.

Stacey was then whisked off to Brussels by her long-term beau Joe Swash.

Loose Women! Stacey caught up with some of her Loose Women gal pals

Aww! Stacey gave Bella Penfold a sweet hug inside the bash
description: The TV presenter, 30, offered a glimpse into her latest collection as she donned pieces from the range to the glitzy launch party.
